data.feedback: Architecture is sound, file paths verified, stories well-structured with clear dependencies. Minor API endpoint documentation differences exist but don't block implementation.
issues: Story-3 API endpoints don't exactly match backend (logout doesn't exist, steps routes differ)
filesToRead path 'project-app-pasos-backend/' is at parent directory level
suggestions: Update Story-3 ApiEndpoints to match actual backend: /steps/today, /steps/weekly, /steps/stats instead of /steps/sync
Remove /api/auth/logout from ApiEndpoints (backend uses token expiry only)
